_header: Remember with reverence the Maker of mankind
Title(s): On the Recovery of the Throne by Edward IV; The Balet of the Kynge
_description: On the Recovery of the Throne by Edward IV — forty-six stanzas rhyme royal (with the same C rhymes throughout)
